title: OmegaStarScream
author: OmegaStarScream
content: I'm not sure if there are similar free tools out there but thought I'd share this bot I made a few days ago. You can join the channel here: https://t.me/BitnewsNotifierThe bot watches multiple crypto news sites and notifies users (sends a message to the channel) as soon as an article is published. It's really nothing fancy, but I'm planning to add more features in the future, especially if I see people using it.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: If it's a similar tool then that's a lot I even joined a few channels about crypto news information to know more but for the telegram channel you create news then it's published on telegram bot then I'll follow it this adds a lot of news that I know out there.It's okay, it's not fancy, the important thing is that you regularly keep sharing news with followers of this channel and right now there aren't many following maybe it's just the beginning but I believe the more features you talk about the more people will be interested.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Very well, thanks for your effort.I subscribed to the bot, it works great, but the problem that I encountered is that it contains a lot of news that I am not able to read all of it because it takes a long time.I've only been subscribed for 2 days and there are about 100 new unread posts. This is a lot, although I browsed some news.I saw some bots making a summary of the most important news on one page with a link to each news. This is how it is easier to read the summary, and if you want to read the entire news, you click on the link.I don't know if you can do that or if it takes a lot of work.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 15, 2023, 02:17:25 PMThe bot watches multiple crypto news sites and notifies users (sends a message to the channel) as soon as an article is published. It's really nothing fancy, but I'm planning to add more features in the future, especially if I see people using it.Is there an option to customize the type of news you are looking for, such as Bitcoin or altcoins, and its sources (add new,) or is it just a bot-powered channel?I do not use Telegram groups, so I do not have knowledge of how they work, but if you can customize the channels, I will download/try it.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on March 17, 2023, 05:02:02 AMI subscribed to the bot, it works great, but the problem that I encountered is that it contains a lot of news that I am not able to read all of it because it takes a long time.I've only been subscribed for 2 days and there are about 100 new unread posts. This is a lot, although I browsed some news.Yes. I agree, the user experience can be better, and I think one solution would be to not send more than one article per subject.Quote from: hugeblack on March 17, 2023, 06:19:38 AMIs there an option to customize the type of news you are looking for, such as Bitcoin or altcoins, and its sources (add new,) or is it just a bot-powered channel?I do not use Telegram groups, so I do not have knowledge of how they work, but if you can customize the channels, I will download/try it.At the moment, it's just a bot-powered channel so there's no way to customize anything, everyone is getting the same news. The first suggestion should be achievable, as most of these sites/articles have tags. Allowing users to add new sources, however, may be difficult to achieve especially if I want to summarize their articles.

comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 15, 2023, 02:17:25 PMYou can join the channel here: https://t.me/BitnewsNotifierI still can read the news without login and joining your telegram.what API did you use? can you make a filter language?, maybe if I join your telegram, I can control on what I want to receive news from my local language only, not in global as it is now.thanks.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on March 15, 2023, 10:09:59 PMIf it's a similar tool then that's a lot I even joined a few channels about crypto news information to know more but for the telegram channel you create news then it's published on telegram bot then I'll follow it this adds a lot of news that I know out there.You are right. There are a lot of news telegram channels. But the difference is that most of the Telegram channels for news are links chosen by the channel owner who publishes them either by himself or with the help of moderators, while this channel transmits news directly from its source on global news sites and the bot creator is a member known for his integrity as a Bitcointalk moderator.Personally, I would have preferred to visit the news sources myself, but this bot saves me a lot of time, and I have begun to get used to the frequency of notifications, as I receive dozens daily. I've been using the news bot for days, and I encourage everyone to try it.It would be great if Omega continues to work on further developing its features.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on March 24, 2023, 08:11:32 AMI still can read the news without login and joining your telegram.what API did you use? can you make a filter language?, maybe if I join your telegram, I can control on what I want to receive news from my local language only, not in global as it is now.thanks.You can read the news without joining the channel, but you won't receive any updates unless you subscribe to it.Which API do you mean? If you're referring to communicating with telegram API, then I'm using telegram-bot-python.As for the language filter, then could you please elaborate? If you want to receive news in certain languages, then that's obviously doable however, the sites I'm currently watching do not support languages other than English (or at least most of them don't). It would help if you could mention a few reputable sites you know, so that I can add them.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: As Hugeblack mentioned, I would also try your telegram bot if I can filter the news I am interested in. There are a bunch of global websites that publish crypto news. But I am not interested in all crypto news except what's happening regarding Bitcoin. Indeed I don't want to hear what Justin sun is doing with his bunch of altcoins. I am not sure how many websites news your bot is covering right now and how reliable they are since I didn't try your bot yet. Keep the number significantly fewer with some reputed website news; all the news should be trustworthy. If you add too many websites, people will see the same news repeatedly from different websites, which we don't want.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Nice bot, I was looking for something similar. however, it tired me very quickly, it seems that the notifications are too frequent, I ended up muting it. the possibility of adding a filter to make it a little more personalized is more than desirable.When publishing, all articles are sorted by category and most often key tags are added, perhaps maybe this could be used to adjust the content that is interesting to the user.
